bike.description: M5 manipulated alloy w/ ORE TT/DT, 29" geometry, tapered HT, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, replaceable derailleur hanger, 130mm travel

components.description: Specialized/Fox Brain Shock for 29" w/ remote Trail Tune inertia valve, Brain Fade and rebound adj., 7.75x1.8", integrated cartridge bearing shock mount
1-1/8 and 1.5" Threadless, Campy style upper with 1.5" lower, cartridge bearings
2014 butted alloy, single bolt setback, 30.9mm, S/M: 350mm, others: 400mm
34.9mm clamp ID, 7050 hard annodized alloy collar w/ QR, black
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
